column2: CREATE TABLE LogSource (------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H has a record for describing each node that generates a web log or sql log (i.e. each server that is doing the logging) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T Each record is a log node: data describe the location, the service, the instance, and other properties ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- logID smallint NOT # default (#) , --/D uniqueID of this log location varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D place: FNAL (FermiLab) or JHU (Johns Hopkins) service varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D SkyServer, SQL, SkyService, traffic instance varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D name of node uri varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D path to node: www.skyserver.org, skyserver.sdss.org, skyserver.fnal.gov, skyserver.pha.jhu.edu, --/D skyserver.sdss.org, skyservice.pha.jhu.edu, --/D cas.sdss.org, photo-z.net, --/D SDSSAD2.weblog, --/D skyquery.net, skyquery.org, --/D voservices.net, voservices.org, www.skyserver.org framework varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D .NET, ASP, ASP+, SQL, WGET product varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D Version of SDSS Data product: --/D EDR, DR1, DR2, DR3, .. DR6, ALL ( = traffic database) method varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D how log is harvested: Xcopy, Wget, TSQL pathname varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D internet location of log files tstamp datetime NOT # default (getdate () ), --/D time last harvested isvisible tinyint NOT # default (#) , --/D # means hide this data from public. status varchar (#) NOT # default (#) , --/D ACTIVE or INACTIVE primary key (logID) , CONSTRAINT ak_LogSource UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED (location, instance, product) ) go
